planets.name: Mercury
planets.animation: property: rotation; to: 0 360 0; loop: true; dur: 20000

planets.name: Venus
planets.animation: property: rotation; to: 0 -360 0; loop: true; dur: 20000

planets.name: Earth
planets.animation: property: rotation; to: 0 360 0; loop: true; dur: 20000

planets.name: Mars
planets.animation: property: rotation; to: 0 360 0; loop: true; dur: 20000

planets.animation: property: rotation; to: 0 360 0; loop: true; dur: 20000

planets.name: Saturn
planets.animation: property: rotation; to: 0 360 0; loop: true; dur: 20000

planets.name: Uranus
planets.animation: property: rotation; to: 0 -360 0; loop: true; dur: 20000
